profileAlternative.name: Glenn Haskell
profileAlternative.headline: Board Member at New England Employee Benefits Council (NEEBC)

positions.title: Board Member
positions.description:
I support the work of NEEBC, the definitive leader in advancing knowledge and facilitating networking for employee benefit practitioners, consultants and service providers throughout New England. Our 1250 members manage benefits for an estimated 2.5 million employees nationally and member companies span multiple industries and range from small businesses to organizations with 50,000+ employees.

I help provide mission-based leadership and strategic governance and in concert with other board members, serve as trusted advisor to the Executive Director. I help evaluate impact and performance, serve on committees and task forces, act as an ambassador for NEEBC to other stakeholders, ensure NEEBC meets legal and fiduciary responsibilities and recruit board members.
…

positions.title: Benefits Manager
positions.description: Manage employee benefits for workforce of 3200, inlcuding health/welfare, retirement, PTO and associate programs. Also manage Travel Dept.

positions.title: Benefits Director
positions.description: Managed employee benefits for workforce of 9,000

given.text:
My experience with Donna gray was very positive. I worked with her from May 2000 until October of 2005. She was extremely responsive to customer needs. When I made a request of Donna she would always respond immediately with exactly what was needed or at least provide an update on when she could provide what was requested. Her work was extremely accurate...she has excellent attention to detail. She is hard working, personable and professional and was well liked by her colleagues. I highly recommend Donna Gray.
